mapper.select: SELECT s.sen_email_no, r.rec_email_no, s.sender, r.recp, r.refer, s.title, s.cntn, s.email_stat, r.email_stat, r.cust_no FROM email s JOIN inbox r ON s.sen_email_no = r.sen_email_no WHERE s.sen_email_no = #{senEmailNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.cust_no = #{custNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT file_no ,sen_email_no ,save_name ,upl_name ,file_size ,file_ext FROM email_file WHERE sen_email_no = #{senEmailNo} ORDER BY file_no
mapper.insert: CALL insert_email( #{sender, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntn, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recp, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refer, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senEmailNo, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recpType, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT SEN_EMAIL_NO ,SENDER ,TITLE ,CNTN ,SENT_DT ,EMAIL_STAT ,CHAIN_MAIL_NO ,CUST_NO FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX(INBOX email_sen_email_no_pk) */ ROWNUM RN, EMAIL.* FROM EMAIL WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{page} * 5) AND SENDER = #{empId}) ) a WHERE a.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 5
SELECT count(*) FROM EMAIL WHERE email_stat = '3B2b'

SELECT s.sender ,s.title ,s.sent_dt FROM email s JOIN inbox i ON s.sen_email_no = i.sen_email_no WHERE s.email_stat = '3B2b' AND i.email_stat = '3B2b' AND s.cust_no = #{custNo} AND i.cust_no = #{custNo}
SELECT e.emp_name, d.dept_name, j.job_title, e.emp_id FROM emp e JOIN dept d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN jobs j ON e.job_no = j.job_no WHERE e.cust_no = #{custNo}
